name: Pongo (itch) (Özgür Gürbüz)
description:
If you are older enough to see any Atari, you will probably know what this game is all about. 

But just in case I will explain; 

Pong is a table tennis–themed twitch arcade sports video game, featuring simple two-dimensional graphics, manufactured by Atari and originally released in 1972.

It is a simple clone of the original game and it took two hours to develop.
